definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: Gentamycin was brought from Sanming pharmaceutical factory of Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 庆大霉素购自福建三明制药厂。

sentences.english: But drug companies have repeatedly been shown to bury unflattering data.
sentences.chinese: 然而制药公司却一再隐瞒那些对自己不利的数据。

sentences.english: I'm deputy managing director of the Sino-AmericanPharmaceutical Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 我是中美制药有限公司的副总经理。

sentences.english: Process validation continues to be a topic of much debate and confusion for biopharmaceutical manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 工艺验证一直是生物制药企业争论和困惑的话题。

sentences.english: Company is a manufacturer of Chinese and Western medicine and bio-pharmaceutical major pharmaceutical companies.
sentences.chinese: 公司是一家生产中西成药和生物药品的大型制药企业。

sentences.english: PNS:produced by Yunnan Yuxi Wethe Pharmaceutical Factory.
sentences.chinese: 云南玉溪维和制药厂生产。

sentences.english: Hainan QiGuTai Pharmaceutical Co. , LTD. is wholly-owned holding company of Hainan Huanglong Pharmaceutical Co.
sentences.chinese: 是海南皇隆制药的全资控股公司。

sentences.english: He says drug companies are relatively well-protected in economic downturns.
sentences.chinese: 在经济衰退时期制药公司相对比较安全。

sentences.english: What will happen if animals eat the biopharmaceutical crops?
sentences.chinese: 动物吃了这些生物制药的作物后会发生什么？

sentences.english: FIP is a disease that is related to Corona virus.
sentences.chinese: 国际制药联合会是一种疾病，这是相关的冠状病毒。

sentences.english: Modern pharmacy has solved the problem of sleeplessness.
sentences.chinese: 现代制药学已经解决了失眠问题。

sentences.english: Pharmacology is a trunk course in chemical pharmaceutical technology specialty.
sentences.chinese: 药剂学是化学制药技术专业的一门主干课程。

sentences.english: And he says that created this incredible opportunity for drug companies.
sentences.chinese: 他还声称这为制药公司缔造了绝妙机会。

sentences.english: What's the response from the pharmaceuticals companys?
sentences.chinese: 制药公司对此有什么回应？

sentences.english: After we finish producing the dried snake, most of them are sent to medicine factories.
sentences.chinese: 我们完成干蛇制造之后，它门大多数被送往制药厂。

sentences.english: The study was supported by Dainippon Sumitomo Pharma, which discovered zonisamide.
sentences.chinese: 该研究由发现唑尼沙胺的住友制药资助。

definition: chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
